statement.p: Explain step by step how to find a basis in the kernel of A, also known as \Nul(A).
Explain how to find a basis in the range of A, also known as \Col(A).
What is the relationship between the rank of an m \times n matrix A, and the dimensions of \Nul(A), \Col(A), and the numbers m, n? Practice how to estimate one in terms of the others.
